column4: I want to create a DEB package of 3-4 files, but all the howto's talk about tarred up source code, compiling, etc. Where's a *simple* howto for my needs?
what do you want to create a .deb file for
To distribute a handful of scripts to my clients' servers with the ability to update them with apt when I update the scripts.
I hate having to scp the scripts to each server when I update them, and have to remember which one I udated, etc.
